boot_xhprof.php

00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * include this file inside your config.php to get a profiling-overview of your webapp.
00004  * note: you need the xdebug extension
00005  * 
00006  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00007  * @package kata_debugging

00016 if (extension_loaded('xhprof') && (DEBUG>=0)) {
00017     
00018     /*
00019      * xhprof_lib/ path must be in your include_path!
00020      */
00021     require 'utils/xhprof_lib.php';
00022     require 'utils/xhprof_runs.php';
00023     xhprof_enable(XHPROF_FLAGS_CPU + XHPROF_FLAGS_MEMORY);
00024 
00025     register_shutdown_function('kataXhprofShutdown');
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 function kataXhprofShutdown() {
00030     $xhprof_data = xhprof_disable();
00031     $xhprof_runs = new XHProfRuns_Default();
00032     $run_id = $xhprof_runs->save_run($xhprof_data, CACHE_IDENTIFIER);
00033 
00034     if (!defined('XHPROF_URL')) {
00035         die('you need to set XHPROF_URL to the absolute path of the xhprof_html directory');
00036     }
00037     $profiler_url = sprintf('%s?run=%s&source=%s', XHPROF_URL, $run_id, CACHE_IDENTIFIER);
00038     
00039     switch (DEBUG) {
00040     case 2:
00041     case 3:
00042         echo '<div style="padding:10px;border:5px solid red;z-index:2000;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;background-color:white;">'.
00043         '<a href="'.$profiler_url.'">xhprof report</a></div>';
00044         break;
00045     case 1:
00046         debug('xhprof report: '.$profiler_url);
00047         break;
00048     case 0:
00049         writeLog('xhprof report: '.$profiler_url.' '.env('QUERY_STRING'),KATA_DEBUG);
00050         break;
00051     }
00052 }
